name: Orangutangled
description:
Parkour your way throughout the jungle. Swing and climb to your long-beloved bananas. Try beating your friends in this goofy and wacky physics-based game. Prepare yourself to master awkward and fun controls by only controlling your arms. Jump in and destroy your friend's score! 

{BEST PLAYED WITH CONTROLLER}

This awesome game is the result of four creative students who teamed up in the first sprint of 2 Games a Month (2GAM)  2023.

2 Games a Month is a yearly indie development program for aspiring entrepreneurs. It’s a dynamic meeting ground for complementary profiles in which the focus is developing cool games with market potential.
